description: EgressNetworkPolicySpec provides a list of policies on outgoing network traffic

items.description: EgressNetworkPolicyRule contains a single egress network policy rule

to.description: EgressNetworkPolicyPeer specifies a target to apply egress network policy to

cidrSelector.description: cidrSelector is the CIDR range to allow/deny traffic to

type.description: type marks this as an "Allow" or "Deny" rule

egress.description: egress contains the list of egress policy rules
